mapper.select: SELECT IDENT1_0 AS PN, TYPDOC_0 AS DocType, NAM_0 AS Path, CASE WHEN CAT_0 IN (3,4,5,6,8,12,13,14,19) THEN 'Drawing' WHEN CAT_0 IN (9,18) THEN 'Manual' WHEN CAT_0 IN (15) THEN 'Certificate' ELSE 'Other' END AS Cat FROM EXPLOIT.AOBJTXT WHERE ABREV_0='ITM' AND IDENT1_0=#{Pn} ORDER BY ROWID DESC
